data.title: Reading the shampoo bottle
data.statement:
Your phone battery is dead while on the toilet, so the shampoo bottles suddenly become a most intriguing read. You make it a sport to find the volume in ml  as fast as possible, in between all the other text.

Given some [[shampooBottleText]], output the [[volume]] {{ml}} as given in that text.


Every [[shampooBottleText]] has one volume between 200-1000 ml (inclusive), and it is always given with the unit {{ml}} (either or not space-separated).

testCases.title: Aloe
testCases.testIn: Ingredients: Sodium, Lauryl, Other Sulphate, SLES, CDEA, CMEA, CABP, extract of Aloe vera, Perfumed & Colour. Net volume: 1000ml

testCases.title: Validator 1
testCases.testIn: Ingredients: Sodium, Lauryl, Other Sulphate, SLES, CDEA, CMEA, CABP, extract of Aloe vera, Perfumed & Colour. Net volume: 900ml

testCases.title: Not for us
testCases.testIn: Directions for use: Wet the animal thoroughly with clean water. Apply KinLeMed Medicated Shampoo to the animal at several points and massage into the coat. A sponge assist lathering and penetration of shampoo into the coat. Make sure to apply it around the lips, under the tail and between the toes as these areas may harbor infectious organisms. Leave the lathered shampoo on skin for 10 minutes then rinse off with clean water. Repeat twice weekly until symptoms subside, or as recommended by your veterinarian. 320ml

testCases.title: Validator 2
testCases.testIn: Directions for use: Wet the animal thoroughly with clean water. Apply KinLeMed Medicated Shampoo to the animal at several points and massage into the coat. A sponge assist lathering and penetration of shampoo into the coat. Make sure to apply it around the lips, under the tail and between the toes as these areas may harbor infectious organisms. Leave the lathered shampoo on skin for 10 minutes then rinse off with clean water. Repeat twice weekly until symptoms subside, or as recommended by your veterinarian. 420ml

testCases.title: Use a cloth
testCases.testIn: Directions: Moisten wash cloth with Rinse Free Shampoo & body cleanser. Use wash cloth to gently cleanse desired area. Pat dry if necessary. When shampooing, use was cloth to gently massage hair and scalp. Let air dry. Ingredients: Water, Disodium Cocoamphodiactate, Sodium C14-16 Olefine Sulfonate, ppg-2 hydroxethyl Cocamide, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Germaben II, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Fragrance, Aloe Barbadeniss Leaf Juice 450 ml

testCases.title: Validator 3
testCases.testIn: Directions: Moisten wash cloth with Rinse Free Shampoo & body cleanser. Use wash cloth to gently cleanse desired area. Pat dry if necessary. When shampooing, use was cloth to gently massage hair and scalp. Let air dry. Ingredients: Water, Disodium Cocoamphodiactate, Sodium C14-16 Olefine Sulfonate, ppg-2 hydroxethyl Cocamide, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Germaben II, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Fragrance, Aloe Barbadeniss Leaf Juice 550 ml

testCases.title: 1-2 minutes
testCases.testIn: DIRECTION FOR USE: Apply 2ml. on wet hairs & massage gently, leave for 1-2 minutes and range with water. Net Volume: 200ml. INGREDIENTS: Branghraj 5.0gm.,Jatamansi 2.5gm., Kalorji 2.5gm., Green tea 1.0gm., Cocoa Beans Oil & Glycerine 5 ml.

testCases.title: Validator 4
testCases.testIn: DIRECTION FOR USE: Apply 3ml. on wet hairs & massage gently, leave for 1-2 minutes and range with water. Net Volume: 250ml. INGREDIENTS: Branghraj 5.0gm.,Jatamansi 2.5gm., Kalorji 2.5gm., Green tea 1.0gm., Cocoa Beans Oil & Glycerine 4 ml.

testCases.title: Colored, dry and damaged
testCases.testIn: FOR COLORED, DRY AND DAMAGED HAIR. Enriched with Multi Vitamin and herbal extracts, Hobby Shampoo gently cleans and protects color-treated and damaged hair from root to tip and provides sensitive care. Ingredients: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Benzyl Salicylate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Cl 400, Cl 500. 750ml. Multi Vitamin 800.

testCases.title: Validator 5
testCases.testIn: FOR COLORED, DRY AND DAMAGED HAIR. Enriched with Multi Vitamin and herbal extracts, Hobby Shampoo gently cleans and protects color-treated and damaged hair from root to tip and provides sensitive care. Ingredients: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Benzyl Salicylate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Cl 400, Cl 500. 850ml. Multi Vitamin 800.

testCases.title: 150 ml is simply not enough
testCases.testIn: FOR HAIR ON HEADS THAT SIMPLY GRAB THREE OR FOUR DIGITS AS ANSWER. Enriched by good comments of the community, Coding Shampoo gently cleans and protects color-treated and damaged code from 150 ml to 180ml distractions. Volume is 200ml, which is the bottom constraint. Multi Vitacode 800.

testCases.title: Validator 6
testCases.testIn: FOR HAIR ON HEADS THAT SIMPLY GRAB THREE OR FOUR DIGITS AS ANSWER. Enriched by good comments of the community, Coding Shampoo gently cleans and protects color-treated and damaged code from 150 ml to 180ml distractions. Volume is 200ml, which is the bottom constraint. Multi Vitacode 800.

data.inputDescription: <<Line 1:>> string [[shampooBottleText]], text of some shampoo bottle, including some [[volume]] in ml
data.outputDescription: String with [[volume]] {{ml}} of the shampoo bottle.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Your phone battery is dead while on the toilet, so the shampoo bottles suddenly become a most intriguing read. You make it a sport to find the volume in ml as fast as possible, in between all the other text.

Given some shampooBottleText, output the volume ml as given in that text.


Every shampooBottleText has one volume between 200-1000 ml (inclusive), and it is always given with the unit ml (either or not space-separated).
Input
Line 1: string shampooBottleText, text of some shampoo bottle, including some volume in ml
Output
String with volume ml of the shampoo bottle.
Constraints
200<=volume<=1000 ml
Example
Input
Ingredients: Sodium, Lauryl, Other Sulphate, SLES, CDEA, CMEA, CABP, extract of Aloe vera, Perfumed & Colour. Net volume: 1000ml
Output
1000 ml
